channel.title: LagMac OS W
channel.description:
LagMac OS W without theme - or atleast im pretty sure it doesnt have the theme because the theme was only on my compter. But im not sure because i have not installed it yet. Hey guys, I have just completed my first Linux Distro Lagmac OS W*.
It is ubuntu 7.10 with modded gnome/kde. It has about 200 games (only a few show in start menu (like 80)). Has wine included, has full compiz/compiz advanced installed. Comes with nvidia GLX NEW drivers. Is only 161 updates behind current ubuntu (just click update in top corner).
More features: -Mac dock -Vista Sidebar -Mac Bootskin -Mac login(not sure because haven't installed from live cd yet) -1.7gb download -Resource monitor -Full jdk/java for making private servers -like 5 programming programs WINDOWS GAMES: Gta 3 nfs high stakes Age of empires 2
Minimum specs: 512Mb Ram Vga video card (dvi/512mb recommended) 700mhz cpu (1.4ghz+ recommended) 7GB Hdd space (20gb+ recommended) TV tuner for tv
Screen Shots: Fire thingy [IMG]http://doognotna.co.nz/lagmac/fire.png[/img] Flip 3d [IMG]http://doognotna.co.nz/lagmac/flips.png[/img] Sidebar: [IMG]http://doognotna.co.nz/lagmac/sidebar.png[/img] Desktop cube: [IMG]http://doognotna.co.nz/lagmac/lagmac.png[/img]
[B][I]DOWNLOAD:[/I][/B] [B]Torrent[/B] Type: application/octet-stream Size: 16.666015625 Kb Stored in: [url=http://doognotna.co.nz/upload/lagmac.torrent]http://doognotna.co.nz/upload/lagmac.torrent[/url] - Now working - Please use torrent not direct....
[B]Direct[/B] http://doognotna.co.nz:81/lagmac.iso - If possible use the torrent, it will become faster due to more connections... Otherwise this link will become extremely slow.
Installation:**** To install lagmac os w you need the following: -DVD burner -Empty dvd -Burning software -Windows/Mac/Linux -x86 or x64 cpu (not x64 software, so will run at x86 speed on 64 bit cpus)
1. burn the .iso image that you downloaded onto a dvd. 2. insert the dvd. 3. shutdown your computer. 4.Turn on your coumputer (and make sure it boots into cds) 5. press enter on the option Start or install Kubuntu 6. Wait for it to load up and login. 7. double click install on the desktop and follow the instructions**.
* Linux And Gay Mac
Operating System
Windows
** For dual boot, you need to use largest continuous free space or manually partition (takes ages to describe so look it up on google)
*** SYSTEMS THAT ARE NOT COMPATIBLE: only known incompatible config: -Motherboard: Asus M2V-Mx -Video Card: nvidia 7300gs -CPU: AMD athlon 64 3500+
**** IF (your_screen_just_goes_random_colours_when_you_have_booted_it_onto_the_live_cd) { your_pc = incompatible; } Should work if your pc isnt with those specs.

item.title: LagMac OS W
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

LagMac OS W without theme - or atleast im pretty sure it doesnt have the theme because the theme was only on my compter. But im not sure because i have not installed it yet.
Hey guys, I have just completed my first Linux Distro Lagmac OS W*.

It is ubuntu 7.10 with modded gnome/kde. It has about 200 games (only a few show in start menu (like 80)). Has wine included, has full compiz/compiz advanced installed. Comes with nvidia GLX NEW drivers. Is only 161 updates behind current ubuntu (just click update in top corner).

More features:
-Mac dock
-Vista Sidebar
-Mac Bootskin
-Mac login(not sure because haven’t installed from live cd yet)
-1.7gb download
-Resource monitor
-Full jdk/java for making private servers
-like 5 programming programs
WINDOWS GAMES:
Gta 3
nfs high stakes
Age of empires 2

Minimum specs:
512Mb Ram
Vga video card (dvi/512mb recommended)
700mhz cpu (1.4ghz+ recommended)
7GB Hdd space (20gb+ recommended)
TV tuner for tv

Screen Shots:
Fire thingy

Flip 3d

Sidebar:

Desktop cube:

DOWNLOAD:
Torrent
Type: application/octet-stream
Size: 16.666015625 Kb
Stored in: http://doognotna.co.nz/upload/lagmac.torrent - Now working - Please use torrent not direct…

Direct
http://doognotna.co.nz:81/lagmac.iso - If possible use the torrent, it will become faster due to more connections… Otherwise this link will become extremely slow.

Installation:****
To install lagmac os w you need the following:
-DVD burner
-Empty dvd
-Burning software
-Windows/Mac/Linux
-x86 or x64 cpu (not x64 software, so will run at x86 speed on 64 bit cpus)

  1. burn the .iso image that you downloaded onto a dvd.
  2. insert the dvd.
  3. shutdown your computer.
    4.Turn on your coumputer (and make sure it boots into cds)
  4. press enter on the option Start or install Kubuntu
  5. Wait for it to load up and login.
  6. double click install on the desktop and follow the instructions**.

Linux
And
Gay
Mac

Operating
System

Windows

**
For dual boot, you need to use largest continuous free space or manually partition (takes ages to describe so look it up on google)

SYSTEMS THAT ARE NOT COMPATIBLE:
only known incompatible config:
-Motherboard: Asus M2V-Mx
-Video Card: nvidia 7300gs
-CPU: AMD athlon 64 3500+

IF (your_screen_just_goes_random_colours_when_you_have_booted_it_onto_the_live_cd)
{
your_pc = incompatible;
}
Should work if your pc isnt with those specs.
